title: I got randomly banned????
body: I recently got banned on this account, I can't play league on it or anything but can still post but, I got banned for no reason, I've gotten a third party program warning before, but I've deleted it eversince, now only a few days ago, I got banned, for the same reason but this time for no reason, I've had no contact with 3rd party programs for almost 7 months, and I got banned, I am currently 13 years old and Platinum 2, I wish to be unbanned, but I was banned for scripts, although I don't script or have no idea how they work, I would like any rioter to see this.

replies.body: 13 YEARS OLD PLAT 2 HOW THE FUCK?
This is why LoL doesnt have ingame chat like dota does. It would be the biggest tilt ever.
Dota is the definition of farming simulator. I don't know if your statement is directed at me, but that was a compliment to him...
I know, a lot of people don't believe me either.

But like...
How long have you been playing?
So many people getting banned right now lol the boards are full of the same situation
yeh because we have done what we were told being the removal of 3rd party programs and then we get fucked over because we get banned after fixing the problem
